description: The West Edge Jogger is the ultimate men's workout pant thanks to this unique blend of recycled poly and organic cotton, ergonomic seam placement, elastic waistband and drawcord, and the secure zip pocket. From early morning workouts, to a quick lunch sweat session, to an evening jog, to the well-deserved finale on the couch, this pant will see you through it all.
name: Prana West Edge Joggers, 30" Inseam - Mens
